SEARCH
Package com.conductor.core.manager

Class ApplicationManager

java.lang.Object
com.conductor.core.manager.ApplicationManager
@Component public class ApplicationManager extends Object
Provides operations for creating, approving, rejecting, canceling, and managing forms or comments for an applications. The operations are also persisted.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationManager

      public ApplicationManager()

  • Method Details

    • registerApplication

      public Application registerApplication(User user, Resource targetResource, String formResponse)
      Creates a new Application for the specified User and Resource and persists it.
      Parameters:
      user - user creating the application (must not be null or transient ).
      targetResource - resource being applied to (must not be null or transient ).
      formResponse - optional response of the form. Must be validated by the callee.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any argument is null
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - if an application by the user for the same resource already exists or a database operations failed due to arguments being null or transient.

    • approveApplication

      public Application approveApplication(User approvedBy, String applicationExternalId)
      Approves an existing Application then persists the change.
      Parameters:
      approvedBy - user approving the application (must not be null or transient)
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application (must not be null)
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      IllegalArgumentException - if arguments are null
      IllegalStateException - if application is in final state. See Application.isFinalStatus()
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.

    • cancelEventApplication

      public Application cancelEventApplication(String applicationExternalId)
      Cancels an existing Application.
      Parameters:
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application (must not be null)
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.
      IllegalStateException - if application is in final state. See Application.isFinalStatus()

    • rejectEventApplication

      public Application rejectEventApplication(User user, String applicationExternalId, String reason)
      Rejects an existing Application with a reason and then persists it.
      Parameters:
      user - user rejecting the application (must not be null)
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application (must not be null)
      reason - reason for rejection (must not be null)
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.
      IllegalStateException - if application is in final state. See Application.isFinalStatus()

    • addComment

      public Application addComment(User user, String applicationExternalId, String comment)
      Adds a comment to an existing Application.
      Parameters:
      user - user adding the comment (must not be null)
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application (must not be null)
      comment - comment text (must not be null)
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - for all other exceptions cause due to database operations failure.

    • getAllApplicationsForAResource

      public List<Application> getAllApplicationsForAResource(String resourceExternalId)
      Fetches all applications associated with a target resource.
      Parameters:
      resourceExternalId - external identifier of the resource
      Returns:
      list of Application objects for the resource
      Throws:
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - if database operation failed

    • getAllPendingApplicationsOfResourceType

      public List<Application> getAllPendingApplicationsOfResourceType(ResourceType resourceType)
      Fetches all applications associated with a target resource.
      Parameters:
      resourceType - type of the resource
      Returns:
      list of Application objects for the resource
      Throws:
      ApplicationRequestFailedException - if database operation failed

    • findApplication

      public Application findApplication(String applicationExternalId)
      Finds an application by its external ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationExternalId - external identifier of the application
      Returns:
      the found Application
      Throws:
      ApplicationNotFound - if the application cannot be found
